title: Please stop your government worshiping
selftext: The government is set to destroy the habitat of the Shompen people from Great Nicobar Island. It’s the most isolated island of the world and any work there is a death sentence to the natives. Educate yourselves and others on this. Your government is no better than the colonisers.
comments: Why don't you think about the homeless people around your house first ?
